name: Hacker News Dark
description: This style attempts to preserve the default view while being easier on the eyes. Neither the font styles nor the size and position of any elements on the page are affected.
additional_info: The repository containing the CSS can be found at GitHub, so feel free to make fixes and submit pull requests as needed. Change Log (dd/mm/yyyy): 29/08/2015: Added selector for dark footer text 08/08/2015: Merge pull request from Farow: invert colors of the upvote image 25/07/2015: Fixed dark comment text against dark background
